lead_paragraph: Johnson Wagner bogeyed two of three holes midway through the first round of the Crowne Plaza Invitational in Fort Worth, but matched his best score on the PGA Tour — a seven-under 63 and a two-stroke lead over Phil Mickelson and Brett Wetterich.
snippet: Johnson Wagner bogeyed two of three holes midway through the first round of the Crowne Plaza Invitational in Fort Worth, but matched his best score on the PGA Tour — a seven-under 63 and a two-stroke lead over Phil Mickelson and Brett Wetterich.
